de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.annotation.field

Annotation Type Property


  • @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Property
    With this annotation one can specify, how a field shall be stored inside the IDataStore

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static java.lang.String UNDEFINED_COLUMN_NAME 
      static java.lang.String UNDEFINED_COLUMN_TYPE 
      static int UNDEFINED_INTEGER 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String columnType
      With this property you are able to override the column type, which is generated by the choosen driver.
      int length
      Defines the length of a column inside the datastore.
      boolean nullable
      Set the column nullable ( allow null ).
      int precision
      Defines the decimal precision of numeric values.
      int scale
      Defines the scale of numeric values.
      java.lang.String value
      Specifies the name of the field in the IDataStore.

    • Field Detail

      • UNDEFINED_COLUMN_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String UNDEFINED_COLUMN_NAME

      • UNDEFINED_COLUMN_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String UNDEFINED_COLUMN_TYPE

      • UNDEFINED_INTEGER

        public static final int UNDEFINED_INTEGER

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Specifies the name of the field in the IDataStore. If undefined, then the name of the field in the POJO will be used
        Returns:
        the name or empty String if undefined
        Default:
        ""

      • nullable

        public abstract boolean nullable
        Set the column nullable ( allow null ). Default = true
        Returns:
        true, if nullable
        Default:
        true

      • columnType

        public abstract java.lang.String columnType
        With this property you are able to override the column type, which is generated by the choosen driver. WARNING: by using this property, changes from one driver to another might cause indifferent problems
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • length

        public abstract int length
        Defines the length of a column inside the datastore. Default = UNDEFINED_INTEGER. If the value is undefined, it will be defined by the IColumnHandler
        Returns:
        the length
        Default:
        -1

      • precision

        public abstract int precision
        Defines the decimal precision of numeric values. Default = UNDEFINED_INTEGER, If the value is UNDEFINED_INTEGER, then the default value will be taken from the IColumnHandler
        Returns:
        the precision
        Default:
        -1

      • scale

        public abstract int scale
        Defines the scale of numeric values. Default = UNDEFINED_INTEGER. If the value is UNDEFINED_INTEGER, then the default value will be taken from the IColumnHandler
        Returns:
        the scale
        Default:
        -1
